name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Center for Coastal, Energy & Environmental Resources.

subject.topic: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Center for Coastal, Energy & Environmental Resources

mods.abstract: Seismogram recorded in the Howe-Russell Geoscience Complex during the Louisiana State University vs. Auburn University football game on October 8, 1988. Trailing by six points, LSU quarterback Tommy Hodson threw a touchdown pass to tailback Eddie Fuller on fourth down with 1:47 remaining in the game. The eruption of the crowd registered on the seismograph, shaking the ground as much as a small earthquake.

titleInfo.title: LSU University Archives Print Materials Collection

mods.accessCondition: Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Examination and reproduction are governed by state and federal public records laws.
Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
